attributes.action: Resign his position as Prime Minsiter of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Gordon Brown's take over of Tony Blairs position this country has fastly fallen down a steep slope, This country is now faced with serious problems, We owe an Unconsiberatle amount of money which we cannot afford to pay back, We have immigrants running around claiming for what they do no earn and certainly do not deserve, i do not condone the fact there are bad people doing bad thing to them in their own countries but the fact of the matter is there is bad people doing bad things in this country aswell. The British people now have a limited amount of jobs because of the amount of foreign workers coming over to this country to work to send money back home. There are more problems to this country but the first step to making a better country would be to vote out Gordon Brown. Please sign!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
